pullRequest.title: Add verbose failure support to LDAP authentication
pullRequest.bodyText:
If the LDAP authentication cannot be done due to a server
error, throw an AuthenticationServiceUnavailableException.
This gives the user (and the audit log) an indicator, that
it wasn't his fault that he couldn't log in.
Refs #8136

commit.message:
Add verbose failure support to LDAP authentication

If the LDAP authentication cannot be done due to a server
error, throw an AuthenticationServiceUnavailableException.
This gives the user (and the audit log) an indicator, that
it wasn't his fault that he couldn't log in.

Refs #8136

commit.message:
Avoid AuthenticationServiceUnavailableException w/ invalid credentials

For reasons we are not gonna fix right now,
failing a bind with wrong credentials always
raises a RuntimeExcepction.

Just return null for now to avoid indicating a server problem.
